title: Clash Team, Sup Main Plat 4 Last season will be playing on my silver 2 acc
body: Hi All looking for a clash team to play with, was plat 4 last season on my main and gold on my other acc. will be playing on my other acc as ive done the 10 games there. Add Chaos Evolucian thanks :)

replies.body: add "high deft" if you are still looking for a team :)
